question: Which player won the Stefan Edberg Sportsmanship Award at ATP Awards?
explanation:
Former world number one tennis player Rafael Nadal bagged the Stefan Edberg Sportsmanship Award for the third year in a row.
The Tennis star also bagged the award fourth time in his career at the ATP Awards. Nadal, who won his 13th Roland Garros title at the French Open this year, was voted for the award by fellow players. The 17-year-old Carlos Alcaraz of Spain was the newcomer of the year.
